name: Steve Pearson
what_you_do: Steve Pearson is the founder of the Gut Gratitude Community App, a platform dedicated to helping others transform their lives through the power of gratitude.
who_you_serve: Steve helps others create a grateful mindset through bespoke coaching programs and the Gut Gratitude Community App.
signature_programs: The 7 Pillars of a Profitable Practice Course
business_focus: Helping others transform their lives through the power of gratitude.
